snippet: An annual conference that helps set economic policy ended  with the government warning about difficulties in the global economy, but suggesting few policy changes.
lead_paragraph: An annual conference that helps set economic policy ended  with the government warning about difficulties in the global economy, but suggesting few policy changes.

headline.seo: China Plans on Continuity in Economic Policy in 2013
headline.main: China Plans on Continuity in Economic Policy in 2013
headline.print_headline: China Plans on Continuity in Economic Policy in 2013
